channel.title: Help with special attacks
channel.description: i had specials right at first but then i messed it up by adding an emote thing with dbaxespec so now the spec bar comes on emote tab and currently i believe only dbaxe spec works, wut i need help with or a push in the right direction on: how to move the bar back to the choose attack style tab, and possibly make other spec's work too! help me plz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2009, 02:47:24 pm[/size][hr]another thing i would like to do is add ancients to the blank tab next to the friends list and ignore list, any hints on that too would really help me lots[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2009, 03:04:03 pm[/size][hr]bump...plz some1 give me a hint atleast, if u need any code just ask[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2009, 03:10:51 pm[/size][hr]half solved!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! got the tab for ancients set correctly!!!! now i need help fixing specials![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2009, 03:37:11 pm[/size][hr]got it half fixed! spec bar is bak on the proper tab but now when i click it, it wont light up and take away spec etc

item.title: Help with special attacks
item.dc:creator: @slick slick
item.description:
@slick wrote:

i had specials right at first but then i messed it up by adding an emote thing with dbaxespec so now the spec bar comes on emote tab and currently i believe only dbaxe spec works, wut i need help with or a push in the right direction on: how to move the bar back to the choose attack style tab, and possibly make other spec’s work too! help me plz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2009, 02:47:24 pm[/size][hr]another thing i would like to do is add ancients to the blank tab next to the friends list and ignore list, any hints on that too would really help me lots[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2009, 03:04:03 pm[/size][hr]bump…plz some1 give me a hint atleast, if u need any code just ask[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2009, 03:10:51 pm[/size][hr]half solved!!! got the tab for ancients set correctly!!! now i need help fixing specials![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2009, 03:37:11 pm[/size][hr]got it half fixed! spec bar is bak on the proper tab but now when i click it, it wont light up and take away spec etc
